mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CLUB VALUES( concat('c_', CLUB_NO_SEQ.nextval), #{u_id}, #{c_type}, #{c_title}, #{c_tag}, #{c_people}, #{c_recruit}, #{c_period}, #{c_date}, #{c_place}, #{c_content}, 'n', sysdate, 0, 0, 0)

SELECT concat('c_',CLUB_NO_SEQ.currval) FROM dual
INSERT INTO CLUBIMAGE (CIMG_NUM , C_NUM , CIMG_PATH , CIMG_NAME) VALUES(concat('cimg_', CLUBIMAGE_NO_SEQ.nextval), #{c_num}, #{cimg_path}, #{cimg_name})
mapper.select: SELECT b.rnum rnum, b.C_NUM C_NUM, b.CIMG_NAME CIMG_NAME, b.C_TYPE C_TYPE, b.C_TITLE C_TITLE, b.c_people c_people, b.C_PERIOD C_PERIOD, b.C_DATE C_DATE, b.C_PLACE C_PLACE, b.C_ENTRY C_ENTRY, b.C_HITS C_HITS FROM (Select rownum rnum, a.C_NUM C_NUM, a.CIMG_NAME CIMG_NAME, a.C_TYPE C_TYPE, a.C_TITLE C_TITLE, a.c_people c_people, a.C_PERIOD C_PERIOD, a.C_DATE C_DATE, a.C_PLACE C_PLACE, a.C_ENTRY C_ENTRY, a.C_HITS C_HITS FROM (SELECT C.C_NUM C_NUM, I.CIMG_NAME CIMG_NAME, C.C_TYPE C_TYPE, C.C_TITLE C_TITLE, C.c_people c_people, C.C_PERIOD C_PERIOD, C.C_DATE C_DATE, C.C_PLACE C_PLACE, C.C_ENTRY C_ENTRY, C.C_HITS C_HITS FROM CLUB C JOIN CLUBIMAGE I ON c.c_num = i.c_num ORDER BY to_number(substr(C.C_NUM, 3))) a WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endCount}) b WHERE b.rnum >= #{startCount}

SELECT b.rnum rnum, b.C_NUM C_NUM, b.CIMG_NAME CIMG_NAME, b.C_TYPE C_TYPE, b.C_TITLE C_TITLE, b.c_people c_people, b.C_PERIOD C_PERIOD, b.C_DATE C_DATE, b.C_PLACE C_PLACE, b.C_ENTRY C_ENTRY, b.C_HITS C_HITS FROM (Select rownum rnum, a.C_NUM C_NUM, a.CIMG_NAME CIMG_NAME, a.C_TYPE C_TYPE, a.C_TITLE C_TITLE, a.c_people c_people, a.C_PERIOD C_PERIOD, a.C_DATE C_DATE, a.C_PLACE C_PLACE, a.C_ENTRY C_ENTRY, a.C_HITS C_HITS FROM (SELECT C.C_NUM C_NUM, I.CIMG_NAME CIMG_NAME, C.C_TYPE C_TYPE, C.C_TITLE C_TITLE, C.C_PEOPLE C_PEOPLE, C.C_PERIOD C_PERIOD, C.C_DATE C_DATE, C.C_PLACE C_PLACE, C.C_ENTRY C_ENTRY, C.C_HITS C_HITS FROM CLUB C JOIN CLUBIMAGE I ON c.c_num = i.c_num WHERE C.C_TYPE like #{keyWord} ORDER BY to_number(substr(C.C_NUM, 3))) a WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endCount}) b WHERE b.rnum >= #{startCount}

SELECT b.rnum rnum, b.C_NUM C_NUM, b.CIMG_NAME CIMG_NAME, b.C_TYPE C_TYPE, b.C_TITLE C_TITLE, b.c_people c_people, b.C_PERIOD C_PERIOD, b.C_DATE C_DATE, b.C_PLACE C_PLACE, b.C_ENTRY C_ENTRY, b.C_HITS C_HITS FROM (Select rownum rnum, a.C_NUM C_NUM, a.CIMG_NAME CIMG_NAME, a.C_TYPE C_TYPE, a.C_TITLE C_TITLE, a.c_people c_people, a.C_PERIOD C_PERIOD, a.C_DATE C_DATE, a.C_PLACE C_PLACE, a.C_ENTRY C_ENTRY, a.C_HITS C_HITS FROM (SELECT C.C_NUM C_NUM, I.CIMG_NAME CIMG_NAME, C.C_TYPE C_TYPE, C.C_TITLE C_TITLE, C.c_people c_people, C.C_PERIOD C_PERIOD, C.C_DATE C_DATE, C.C_PLACE C_PLACE, C.C_ENTRY C_ENTRY, C.C_HITS C_HITS FROM CLUB C JOIN CLUBIMAGE I ON c.c_num = i.c_num WHERE
C.C_PLACE like #{one} ||'%'
ORDER BY to_number(substr(C.C_NUM, 3))) a
WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endCount}) b WHERE b.rnum >= #{startCount}
mapper.update: UPDATE club SET c_hits = c_hits + 1 WHERE c_num = #{c_num}
mapper.select: SELECT C.C_NUM C_NUM, C.U_ID U_ID, I.CIMG_NAME CIMG_NAME, C.C_TYPE C_TYPE, C.C_TITLE C_TITLE, C.C_TAG C_TAG, C.C_PEOPLE C_PEOPLE, C.C_RECRUIT C_RECRUIT, C.C_PERIOD C_PERIOD, C.C_DATE C_DATE, C.C_PLACE C_PLACE, C.C_CONTENT C_CONTENT, C.C_REGDATE C_REGDATE, C.C_ENTRY C_ENTRY, C.C_HITS C_HITS FROM CLUB C JOIN CLUBIMAGE I ON c.c_num = i.c_num WHERE C.C_NUM = #{c_num}
